requestParams.name: account_type
requestParams.desc: 帐号类型（与帐户ID配合使用: 2=粉丝(原fansId),3:手机号,4:三方帐号(原open_user_id);6:微信open_id）

requestParams.name: biz_value
requestParams.desc: 外部业务标识, 相同帐号、业务标识字段的重复调用在三个月内不会重复发放积分

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['account_id']="13800138000"
params['account_type']=3
params['biz_value']="T18djn546q"
params['points']=123
params['reason']="新版测试"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.crm.customer.points.sync', '3.1.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'13800138000', 'account_type' => '3', 'biz_value' => 'T18djn546q', 'points' => '123', 'reason' => '新版测试', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

errorCodes.solution: 对同一个客户的调用减少并发数
检查参数是否漏传或类型错误或为空
